item.title: Raichur: Minor girl killed by father over relationship with youngster of different caste
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Minor girl killed by father over relationship with youngster of different caste
Vartha Bharati | 28-04-2025 | 16:57:00 IST
Raichur: A case of honour killing has been reported from Hanchinala village in Lingasugur taluk, where a father allegedly killed his underage daughter over her relationship with a youth from a different caste.
According to the police, 17-year-old Renuka, who belonged to the Kuruba community, was killed by her father, Lakkappa Kambali. After committing the cri...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
